channel.title: Text Mining on Thinking Through the Party
channel.description: Recent content in Text Mining on Thinking Through the Party

item.title: Text Mining LOST
item.description: We’re text mining the transcripts of the TV show LOST, and visualizing them! I retrieved and parsed the transcripts of LOST from Lostpedia1 and used a few different tools to look at this data. One thing to keep in mind is that this analysis is on only the text that the characters speak. I’m not a big LOST connoisseur, so take these visualizations at their face value and not as some objective judgement about your favorite LOST character or writer.
